Texts.Chs:
第五条，第二十一项。
大规模杀伤性武器的使用
不允许在战争之外使用任何种类的大规模杀伤性武器。包括轨道轰炸，使用能量投射器或等离子炸弹。类似事件将令首席将军，指挥官或上将被开除。事件参与者也将受到惩罚。
Texts.Eng:
Article 5, Paragraph 21.
About the use of Weapons of Mass Destruction

It is not permitted to use any kind of weapons of mass destruction outside of war. This includes orbital bombardment, the use of energy projectors or plasma bombs. Such an incident will result in the dismissal and expulsion of the leading General, Commander or Admiral. Participants of the incident will also be punished.
